channel.title: North Santiam Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in North Santiam Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 west at OR-22. Continue straight for OR-22 West to Detroit and Salem. Merge left for US-20/OR-126 West to Albany and Eugene.

item.title: Diagram of US-20/OR-126/OR-22 Junction - US-20/OR-126 West
item.description: Map diagram of junction at US-20/OR-126/OR-22 junction on US-20/OR-126 West. Continue straight for OR-22 west to Salem; merge left to continue west on US-20/OR-126 West to Eugene.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 West approaching OR-22 on the west side of Santiam Pass. Continue on US-20/OR-126 West for Albany and Eugene.

item.title: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 West
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. Use OR-22 west for Detroit and Salem; use US-20/OR-126 east for Sisters and Bend.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 East Approaching OR-22
item.description: US-20/OR-126 East approaching OR-22 in Linn County. In background is a West Cascades Scenic Byway sign. Turn left on OR-22 to continue on West Cascades Scenic Byway.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 253
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 253 - OR-22/OR-99E Business/Detroit Lake/Bend.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 253
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 253 - OR-22/Bus. OR-99E/Detroit Lake/Bend.

item.title: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 West
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: US-20/OR-126 West at OR-22
item.description: US-20 East/OR-126 East at OR-22 west. This is the western base of Santiam Pass.

item.title: OR-22 - Detroit Lake StatePark
item.description: OR-22 west to Salem and Mill City; east to Detroit and Idanha at Detroit Lake State Park.

item.title: OR-22 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-22 east to Stayton, Detroit, and Bend.

item.title: OR-22 East - Exit 12
item.description: OR-22 east approaching Exit 12, Golf Club Road/Chemeketa-Santiam Center, 1 mile.

item.title: OR-22 East - Exit 1B - I-5 North
item.description: OR-22 east at Exit 1B, I-5 north to Portland.

item.title: OR-22 East - Exit 9
item.description: OR-22 east at Exit 9, Shaw/Aumsville.

item.title: OR-22 East - Stayton/Sublimity Exit
item.description: OR-22 east at Stayton/Sublimity exit.

item.title: OR-22 East - Stayton/Sublimity Exit
item.description: OR-22 east approaching Stayton/Sublimity exit. This is the eastern terminus of the freeway.

item.title: OR-22 East at Turner Road
item.description: OR-22 east/Bus. OR-99E at Turner Road to Humane Society and Turner.

item.title: OR-22 East Exit 1A - I-5 South
item.description: Begin OR-22 east freeway at Exit 1A, I-5 south to Eugene.

item.title: OR-22 East Exit 1B - I-5 North
item.description: OR-22 east approaching Exit 1B, I-5 north to Portland.

item.title: OR-22 East Exit 2
item.description: OR-22 east at Exit 2, Lancaster/Turner Road.

item.title: OR-22 East Exit 4
item.description: OR-22 west approaching Exit 4, Gaffin Road, 1 mile.

item.title: OR-22 East Exit 5
item.description: OR-22 east at Exit 5, Joseph St.

item.title: OR-22 East Exit 7
item.description: OR-22 east approaching Exit 7, OR-214/Silver Falls State Park, 1/2 mile.

item.title: OR-22 East Exit 7
item.description: OR-22 east at Exit 7, OR-214/Silver Falls State Park.

item.title: OR-22 East Exit 9
item.description: OR-22 east approaching Exit 9, Shaw/Aumsville, 1 mile.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 253
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 253 - OR-22/OR-99E Bus./Stayton/Detroit Lake.
